description: The PEND_ACTION table lists pending admission, transfer, and discharge actions to be taken.

columns.name: PEND_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the pending action record.

columns.name: PEND_EVENT_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The event type for the pending action.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Admission


Discharge


Transfer


Leave of Absence Out


Leave of Absence Return


Leave of Absence Update Out


Leave of Absence Update Return

columns.name: PEND_RECRD_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The record type for the pending action.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


ED Arrival


Hospital Outpatient

columns.name: IS_DELETED_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether the pending action record is inactive or deleted.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: DELETE_TIME
columns.description: The date and time the pending action record was deleted.

columns.name: PAT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the patient record for this row. This column is frequently used to link to the PATIENT table.

columns.name: PAT_ENC_DATE_REAL
columns.description: This is a numeric representation of the date of this contact in your system. The integer portion of the number specifies the date of the contact. The digits after the decimal point indicate multiple contacts on one day.

columns.name: PAT_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: A unique serial number for the patient contact of the pending action record. This number is unique across all patient contacts in the system.

columns.name: REQ_GROUPER
columns.description: The numeric index used to group pending action records.

columns.name: START_TIME
columns.description: The date and time the pending action is to start.

columns.name: END_TIME
columns.description: The date and time the pending action is to end.

columns.name: PEND_PRIORITY_C_NAME
columns.description:
The priority of the pending action.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Preference


Reserved


Hold


None

columns.name: PEND_REASON_C_NAME
columns.description:
The reason for the pending action.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 No Entries Defined

columns.name: PEND_CMNT
columns.description: The comments for the pending action.

columns.name: UNIT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier of the unit in which the pending action will occur.

columns.name: ROOM_ID
columns.description: The ID of the room in which the pending action will occur.

columns.name: BED_ID
columns.description: The ID of the bed in which the pending action will occur.

columns.name: BED_ID_BED_LABEL
columns.description: The name of the bed.

columns.name: PAT_SERVICE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The service of the patient for whom the pending action will occur.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: LOC_KEY
columns.description: The unique key identifying the unit-room-bed of the pending action.

columns.name: PAT_CLASS_C_NAME
columns.description:
The patient type of the patient for whom the pending action will occur.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: PEND_ATND_PROV_ID
columns.description: The ID of the attending provider for the patient at the time the pending action will occur. This ID may be encrypted.

columns.name: PEND_ATND_DT
columns.description: The effective date for the attending provider during the pending action.

columns.name: LVL_OF_CARE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The level of care for the patient for whom the pending action will occur.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: ACCOMMODATION_C_NAME
columns.description:
The accommodation code of the room for the pending action.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: ACCOM_REASON_C_NAME
columns.description:
The accommodation reason for the room for the pending action.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: INCOMING_OK_USR_ID
columns.description: The authorizing user for the incoming patient of the pending transfer. This ID may be encrypted.

columns.name: OUTGOING_OK_USR_ID
columns.description: The authorizing user for the outgoing patient of the pending transfer. This ID may be encrypted.

columns.name: DX_ID
columns.description: The ID number of the diagnosis associated with the pending action. This is not the ICD-9 code of the diagnosis.

columns.name: ADM_COND_C_NAME
columns.description:
The admission condition of the patient for whom the pending action will occur.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: RES_PROV_ID
columns.description: The ID of the resident provider for the patient at the time the pending action will occur. This ID may be encrypted.

columns.name: INTERN_PROV_ID
columns.description: The ID of the intern provider for the patient at the time the pending action will occur. This ID may be encrypted.

columns.name: EXPECT_LEN_OF_STAY
columns.description: The expected length of stay in days of the pending admission for this patient contact.

columns.name: EXPECT_DISCHRG_DT
columns.description: The expected discharge date for the pending discharge of this patient contact.

columns.name: PEND_DISP_C_NAME
columns.description:
The disposition for the pending action.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Release


Keep


Remove

columns.name: ON_LIST_TIME
columns.description: The date and time the pending action is good until.

columns.name: SVC_PRIORITY_C_NAME
columns.description:
The bed service priority to use when the pending action is completed.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: ADT_TRANSFER_RSN
columns.description: A single line freetext reason for the transfer pending action.

columns.name: PEND_TRANSFER_TIME
columns.description: The date and time of the transfer pending action.

columns.name: OLD_BED_PRIORITY_C_NAME
columns.description:
The priority to use for a pending action to the patient's old bed.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: PEND_PRIORITY_C_NAME

columns.name: PEND_REQ_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
The pending bed assignment request status for a pending admission or transfer.  I.e., 1-Requested, 2-Assigned, 3-Rejected, 4-Approved.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Ready to Plan


Assigned


Rejected


Approved


Requested


Pre-assigned


Bed Ready

columns.name: REQUEST_TIME
columns.description: The date and time that the pending bed assignment was requested.

columns.name: REQ_BY_USR_ID
columns.description: The ID of the user requesting the pending bed assignment.

columns.name: ASSIGNED_TIME
columns.description: The date and time that the pending bed assignment was assigned.

columns.name: REJECTED_TIME
columns.description: The date and time that the pending bed assignment was rejected.

columns.name: APPROVED_TIME
columns.description: The date and time that the pending bed assignment was approved.

columns.name: REQ_STATUS_RSN_C_NAME
columns.description:
The pending bed assignment request status reason for a pending admission or transfer.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: TYPE_OF_ROOM_C_NAME
columns.description:
The type of room category number for the pend record. This is extracted as the category title.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: ACCOMMODATION_C_NAME

columns.name: ROOM_REASON_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category number of the reason for the type of room requested for the pend record. This is extracted as the category title.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: TYPE_OF_BED_C_NAME
columns.description:
The type of bed category number for the pend record. This is extracted as the category title.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: BED_REASON_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category number of the reason for the type of bed requested for the pend record. This is extracted as the category title.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: CREATED_BY_USER_ID
columns.description: The user who created this PND record.

columns.name: ADT_PND_ADMITNG_ID
columns.description: Admitting provider associated with the PND.

columns.name: ACUITY_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category number of the acuity level that will be assigned upon confirmation of the pending event record. This is extracted as the category title.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: COMPLETED_YN
columns.description:
This item indicates whether the pending event was used to complete an action.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: IS_DELETED_YN

columns.name: LINKED_EVENT_ID
columns.description: This item holds a link to the Admission, Discharge, Transfer, or Leave of Absence (ADT) event that caused the pending event to become deleted.

columns.name: DELETE_CAUSE_C_NAME
columns.description:
Indicates the reason that a pending event record is marked as deleted.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Manually Freed


Event Performed


Encounter Canceled


Encounter Dismissed


Interface


Event Undone


Purged by batch


Order Canceled


Action Canceled


Batch Cancel


Encounter Rescheduled


Surgical Admit Criteria Failed


HOV Admit Criteria Failed


Duplicate Bed Request


Auto Transfer Failed


New Bed Requested


Moved from ED to L&D

columns.name: EXPECT_DLVR_METH_C_NAME
columns.description:
This is the expected delivery method for a mother who is going to deliver.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Vaginal, Spontaneous


C-Section, Low Transverse


Vertical C-Section


C-Section, Unspecified


Vaginal, Vacuum (Extractor)


Vaginal, Forceps


Vaginal, Breech


Non-Spontaneous Vaginal Delivery


VBAC, Spontaneous


C-Section, Low Vertical


C-Section, Classical


Biochemical

columns.name: TRAN_LD_STAT_YN
columns.description:
Flag to denote if the encounter is for a mother who will deliver


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: IS_DELETED_YN

columns.name: REQUEST_URGENCY_C_NAME
columns.description:
The urgency for the pending bed assignment.  I.e., A-High, B-Medium, or C-Low.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


A-High


B-Medium


C-Low

columns.name: ADT_ORDER_ID
columns.description: Networked to an order ID when the pending event record was created by an order

columns.name: HOSPITAL_AREA_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the hospital area that is associated with the pending action.

columns.name: LOA_REASON_C_NAME
columns.description:
The leave of absence reason category ID for the pending event.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: READ_DTTM
columns.description: Instant when the request was first marked as read.

columns.name: READY_TO_PLAN_DTTM
columns.description: Instant when the request status reached Ready to Plan.

columns.name: PREASSIGNED_DTTM
columns.description: Instant when the request status reached Pre-assigned.

columns.name: BED_READY_DTTM
columns.description: Instant when the request status reached Bed Ready.

columns.name: DELAY_UNTIL_DTTM
columns.description: Time when the current delay expires. At that time, this item is cleared.

columns.name: REQUEST_DIVISION_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item stores the division for which this request falls, if any. The request division is used to divide bed requests into different groups which can be worked and managed independently.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: BP_REQ_READY_MOVE_YN
columns.description:
Is the bed request currently marked ready to move?


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: IS_DELETED_YN

columns.name: BP_REQ_R2M_MANUAL_YN
columns.description:
Was this bed request marked ready to move set manually?


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: IS_DELETED_YN

columns.name: BP_R2M_DTTM
columns.description: Timestamp of the last time this bed request was marked Ready to Move.

columns.name: BP_R2M_SET_BY_ID
columns.description: User who last marked this bed request Ready to Move.

columns.name: PROJ_R2M_DATE
columns.description: Date when we expect the patient to be ready to move.

columns.name: PROJ_R2M_TM
columns.description: Time when we expect the patient to be ready to move.

columns.name: EVENT_RECORD_ID
columns.description: References the event record for use in bed planning notifications

columns.name: BED_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item tracks the type of bed a patient will need when a transfer is completed.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Empty


Standard


Crib


Telemetry


Bariatric

columns.name: OFF_SERVICE_YN
columns.description:
This column tracks if the bed request was completed as off service or off level of care.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: IS_DELETED_YN

columns.name: CANCEL_REASON_C_NAME
columns.description:
This holds the reason the user indicated when cancelling a pending event record.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Created in Error


No Longer Necessary


No Longer Happening Today

columns.name: REJ_REASON_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores the reason the bed request was rejected.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 No Entries Defined
